Question
========

A person achieves a score of 7.9 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 3.2 with a standard deviation 1.8. The z-score of the person with 7.9 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.37
* 2.36
* 2.61

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.37: Incorrect
* 2.36: Incorrect
* 2.61: Correct
